name: ice-burn
caption: Ice Burn

effect.short: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a 30% chance to [burn]{mechanic:burn} the target.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Has a 30% chance to [burn]{mechanic:burn} the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

flavorText:
On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind
surrounds the target. This may leave the target with
a burn.
